means: 上流社会人士，社交界头面人物

sentence.Network_en: Consider Anthony Bruck a wiry and fashionable Chicago socialite and artist.
sentence.Network_cn: 想想安东尼?布鲁克,他是芝加哥的名流和艺术家,他很时髦,说话声音尖细.

sentence.Network_en: AW : Do you think the theme of a social - climbing socialite is universal?
sentence.Network_cn: 你是否认为社会名媛喜欢交际攀比是很普遍的现象?

sentence.Network_en: The tenor eventually weds socialite and conquers the Americans.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后男高音成功赢得美人归,并且名提世界.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 殊不知，「名媛」（Socialite）这个字最早起源于二十世纪初的欧洲，延续著皇室固有的传统，她们的价值并不在炫耀自我，而是运用 …
时装周头排客诞生记(1)- 双语新闻 - 21英语网 ... inseparable 不能分开的 socialite 社交名流，名媛 grab 抓住，夺取.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... suburbanite 郊区居民 socialite 社会名流，名人 Tokyoite 东京市民.
“社交名媛（socialite）”这一概念通常用来形容光鲜亮丽地活跃于上流社会交际圈的女性。单纯的社交名媛，严格意义上来说并不符合“ …

and Paris Hilton is back in an all-women's jail . the socialite was transferred after spending nearly a week a medical ward .帕丽斯。希尔顿回到一女子监狱。这位社会名流是在近一个星期的医疗监护后转入此监狱的。

entry.def: A socialite is a person who attends many fashionable upper-class social events and who is well known because of this.

auth_sentence.content: His diagnosis proves correct; the socialite dies.
auth_sentence.res_content: His diagnosis proves correct; the socialite dies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His diagnosis proves correct; the socialite dies.

auth_sentence.content: It is hard to see how the socialite is necessarily more mentally healthy.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is hard to see how the socialite is necessarily more mentally healthy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is hard to see how the socialite is necessarily more mentally healthy.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"促成"; 2. 表形容词,"有……的"; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明确的;一定的;意志坚强的,立场坚定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de强调+fin界线+ite有……的→adj.明确的;一定的;意志坚强的,立场坚定的
e出+rud原始+ite有……的→走出原始状态→博学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优美的,高雅的,精致的;剧烈的,异常的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+quis寻求+ite有……的→adj.优美的,高雅的,精致的;剧烈的,异常的
favor好感,宠爱+ite有……的→adj.喜爱的,宠爱的
favorite[adj.喜爱的,宠爱的]→adj.喜爱的,宠爱的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有礼貌的,客气的;有教养的,文雅的
stems_affixes.word_buile: pol擦亮,文雅+ite有……的→adj.有礼貌的,客气的;有教养的,文雅的
bedlam混乱,骚乱+ite人或物→n.疯子,狂人

stems_affixes.value_cn: [集合名词]精华;精锐;中坚分子;精英

stems_affixes.word_buile: favor喜爱+ite人或物→n.[favourite]最喜欢的人或物 adj.喜爱的
favorite[n.[favourite]最喜欢的人或物 adj.喜爱的]→n.特别喜欢的人[或物]
gran颗粒+ite人或物→n.花岗岩,花岗石
social社会的+ite人或物→n.社会名流,名士
term+ite人或物→来自拉丁文termes白蚁
ex出+ped脚+ite促成→把脚跨出去→加快
